      • saveToPictures

        public void saveToPictures(java.lang.String folderName,
                           java.lang.String fileName,
                           GPUImageView2.OnPictureSavedListener listener)
        Save current image with applied filter to Pictures. It will be stored on the default Picture folder on the phone below the given folderName and fileName.
        This method is async and will notify when the image was saved through the listener.
        Parameters:
        folderName - the folder name
        fileName - the file name
        listener - the listener

      • saveToPictures

        public void saveToPictures(java.lang.String folderName,
                           java.lang.String fileName,
                           int width,
                           int height,
                           GPUImageView2.OnPictureSavedListener listener)
        Save current image with applied filter to Pictures. It will be stored on the default Picture folder on the phone below the given folderName and fileName.
        This method is async and will notify when the image was saved through the listener.
        Parameters:
        folderName - the folder name
        fileName - the file name
        width - requested output width
        height - requested output height
        listener - the listener

      • capture

        public android.graphics.Bitmap capture(int width,
                                       int height)
                                throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Retrieve current image with filter applied and given size as Bitmap.
        Parameters:
        width - requested Bitmap width
        height - requested Bitmap height
        Returns:
        Bitmap of picture with given size
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • capture

        public android.graphics.Bitmap capture()
                                throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Capture the current image with the size as it is displayed and retrieve it as Bitmap.
        Returns:
        current output as Bitmap
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

        Pauses the GLSurfaceView.
